Reviews.Title: Great addition
Reviews.Author: S. Welch
Reviews.Content: Nice to have additional camera to monitor multiple rooms. First brand that doesn't have scrambled static noise, we've tried 4. Only compliant is that you can't twist the camera eye from side to side, just up and down.  This is the best we've found.

Reviews.Title: ladywolf
Reviews.Author: Ladywolf
Reviews.Content: I love these monitors...I use them for my Granddaughter..Love the night vision..Awesome product. I would recommend this product to everyone..Love it!!

ProductInfo.Features:
High resolution,  color LCD display for crisp picture
Night vision and voice activated picture and sound
Optional cameras let you monitor four rooms simultaneously
ProductInfo.Name: Mobicam DL Digital Additional Camera
